1.content: Alright men are Superior to woman in mortal kombat so which stud should be fighting. The first is the initial add more as the story progresses
1.title: Kombat begins

11.content: Liu Kang is a shaolin monk who won the last tournament and has been challenged by an opponent. Who challenges him
11.title: Liu Kang

choices: Kitana can't win and gives up to a life of slavery
111.content:
http://www.deviantart.com/art/Kitana-132...

Kitana is the princess of out world but helped Liu Kang but wanted to be his master. She walk into the temple and challenges her crush to Mortal Kombat.

Liu Kang smiled as he saw his girl friend walk up with a sway. "Here are the terms. The loser must serve the winner," said the champion.

"Agreed," said Kitana.

Round one fight, said the voice of the announcer.

Liu Kang send Kitana flies with a kick. He stalk over to her as she throws her fans. The monk blocks them and upper cut the his girls freind. "Time for my prize," said Liu Kang. "Do you yeild?"
111.title: Kitana

info.brief_description: Male take charg of female in Mortal Kombat. Let the Kombat begin
info.description:
The Mortal Kombat female are sluts so the men have free reign to do as they wish.

Rules
'Only men on female
Killing is allowed since it is mortal kombat.
Anything is possible
Be descriptive unless it a character choice
